mapper.select: select distinct d.* from tom_emp e,tom_dept d where d.hrcanceled='N'
select d.* from tom_dept d where d.hrcanceled='N'
SELECT t1.* FROM (SELECT t.*,ORDER BY cast(t.modifiedtime as signed integer)DESC AS rk FROM tom_dept t) t1 WHERE rk = 1
select CODE, NAME,TOPCODE,'3' as STATUSS from TOM_DEPT where PK_ORG = #{pkorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HRCANCELED = 'N'
select count(*) from TOM_EMP where DEPTCODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from TOM_DEPT where 1=1 AND HRCANCELED = 'N'
and INSTR(NAME,#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0
select CODE, NAME,TOPCODE,'3' as STATUSS from TOM_DEPT where code = #{pkDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND HRCANCELED = 'N'

from TOM_DEPT where CODE = #{pkDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND HRCANCELED = 'N'

select CODE, NAME,PK_FATHERORG,'3' as STATUSS from TOM_DEPT WHERE HRCANCELED = 'N' order by name asc
select CODE, NAME,PK_FATHERORG,'3' as STATUSS from TOM_DEPT where code = #{pkdept,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND HRCANCELED = 'N'

mapper.update:
update TOM_DEPT
`NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME_EN = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`CODE` = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INNERCODE = #{innercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOPCODE = #{topcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOPNAME = #{topname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_FATHERORG = #{pkFatherorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGCODE = #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGNAME = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_ORG = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPECODE = #{typecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPENAME = #{typename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_TYPEDEFDOC = #{pkTypedefdoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HRCANCELED = #{hrcanceled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_PSNDOC = #{pkPsndoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSNCODE = #{psncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSNNAME = #{psnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATIONTIME = #{creationtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVELCODE = #{levelcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVELNAME = #{levelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_LEVELDEFDOC = #{pkLeveldefdoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOBCODE = #{jobcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOBNAME = #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_JOBDEPTDOC = #{pkJobdeptdoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITYCODE = #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITYNAME = #{cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PK_DEPT = #{pkDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
